title: Kin'iro Loveriche
content:
Kin’iro Loveriche

Kin’iro Loveriche (realeased internationally as Kinkoi: Golden Loveriche) is a visual novel developed by Saga Planets and published internatinally by NekoNyan. More information can be found on the vndb page.

The following guide is based on the original from Seiya-Saiga translated to the english version. The guide requires 3 save slots and will take you through all 6 endings, unlocking all cgs along the way.

Note: Choices marked with a ※ below have cg/scene variations on all options, however the choice listed is the correct one to progress the story.

Sylvia End

Sylvie, take me with you
Reina, what is it you actually do?
Swordplay sounds manly and adventurous
※Choose all three options in the prologue for all CG variations. (This choice will not affect the story)
Save 1
Sylvia
Darling
She’s cute
*Ejaculation choice
Try to communicate somehow
Take the outermost fork and knife
※Choose all three options for all SD CG variations
Scoop up from the back
※Choose both options for all SD CG variations
No, eat is as-is
※Choose both options for all SD CG variations
Don’t drink yet
※Choose all three options for all SD CG variations
Save 2
Pick it up
Place them at a slight angle
Save 3
Hold off

Caminalle H-scene Recovery

Load 2
Wait a second
Place them horizontally to the side
Call me ‘Onii-chan’
※Choose both options for alternate scenes

Sylvia End 2

Load 3
I’m coming in!

Reina End

Load 1
Reina
You look great in a paper apron!
It sure is red!
*Ejaculation choice

Heroina End

Load 1
Heroina
Who?
Why don’t we let it down
※Choose both options for all CG variations. (This is like an ejaculation choice and does not affect the story)
*Ejaculation choice
Have Sylvie join in

Akane End

Load 1
Akane

Ria End

Main menu “Golden Time”
*Ejaculation choice
Guilty
※Choose both options for alternate scenes
